45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Ishaq:hearing Al-Bara say: "There was a man reciting [Surat] Al-Kahf when he saw his riding animal stamping his feet, so he looked and there was something like a shadow or cloud, so he went to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and mentioned that to him. The Prophet (ﷺ) said: "That was the tranquility which descends with the Qur'an, or descends because of the Qur'an

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ سُورَةِ الْكَهْفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About [The Virtue] Of Surat Al-Kahf
